Physics.details: All Physics questions are contextually appropriate for Class 6 ICSE. Questions cover Matter, Physical Quantities & Measurements, Force, Simple Machines, Light, and Magnetism correctly.

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 17: QUADRILATERALS - Set C
invalidPapers.issue: Contains basic arithmetic questions (subtraction) instead of quadrilateral-specific questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 19: POLYGONS - Set B
invalidPapers.issue: Section A contains only basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, LCM, HCF) instead of polygon-specific questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 19: POLYGONS - Set C
invalidPapers.issue: Contains basic arithmetic questions instead of polygon-specific questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 20: RECOGNITION OF 3D SHAPES (SOLIDS) - Set A
invalidPapers.issue: Section A contains ONLY basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, squares, LCM, HCF) - no 3D shapes questions at all

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 22: GEOMETRICAL CONSTRUCTIONS - Set A
invalidPapers.issue: Section A contains only basic arithmetic instead of geometrical construction questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 22: GEOMETRICAL CONSTRUCTIONS - Set C
invalidPapers.issue: Contains basic arithmetic questions instead of geometrical construction questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 26: MEAN AND MEDIAN - Set A
invalidPapers.issue: Contains basic arithmetic mixed with mean/median questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 26: MEAN AND MEDIAN - Set C
invalidPapers.issue: Contains basic arithmetic questions instead of mean/median questions

invalidPapers.title: Maths Practice Paper - CHAPTER 7: SETS - Set A
invalidPapers.issue: Section A contains only basic arithmetic instead of sets-related questions

summary.estimatedInvalidQuestions: 60 questions (approximately 10 MCQs per invalid paper × 9 papers = 90, but some papers are partially valid)
summary.validationMethod: Claude/Copilot direct analysis - No external APIs used
summary.recommendation: Create instant fix script similar to fixMathQuestionsInstant.ts with pre-written contextually appropriate questions for all 9 invalid papers
